    【Lira】Wry smile
 "Just as the Heiwa sisters predicted, this is lit beyond belief." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")

    【Erika】Wry smile
 "Thanks to that, we were able to infiltrate more smoothly than expected." ]])

    MSG([[ I, along with Lira-san and Uran-san, infiltrated the grand auditorium where Hermes-san was holding her lecture. ]])

    MSG([[ By the way, Hiyu-san wasn’t joining because she probably couldn’t stop her nosebleed. ]])

 "Then maybe, if we tell her the truth, she might side with us. We’ll buy as much time as we can, so count on us, Erika." ]])

 "Ah, that’s Erika Ikusa!? And the Princess Gal and Princess Shrine Maiden too!" ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_BGM("BGM10.wav")

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0140.wav")

    【Female Student】
 "They brought the three 'Knight' musketeers from the sports club!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1227.wav")

    【Lira】Serious
 "Make up your mind – are you knights or musketeers?! Sit still, weeds!" ]])

    【The Three 'Knight' Musketeers from Sports Club】
 "Meh~!?" "Spah~!?" "Guh~!?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB05aa")

    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)

    【Uran】Sad
 "We’re just going to talk with Hermes-sama a little, so please forgive us." ]])

    【Security Guard】

    --//特殊選択肢
    -- 　⇒正解なし。何を選んでも口にできず、シナリオが進行。

    MSG([[ No good. ]])

    MSG([[ I can’t tell Hermes-san, who trusts Nemesia so purely, that Nemesia pressured my sister and Daria-san. ]])
